name: Asteroids++ (arocnies)
description:
## Post you highscore in the comments ##

CONTROLS: 

Move - WASD | Arrow keys

Shoot - SPACE

TIPS:

- You have limited ammo, make sure to aim well!

- Be sure to make use of those fuel tanks each wave!

- Don't run out of fuel!

- What you do on one side of your orbit moves your orbit opposite of you! (Channel your KSP skills)
